divs: Sighting Details Drivin truck at 3:45 am.Amazing bright light.Noquestion a ufo.Amazed been driving at night for 23 years and never seenanything.Large ball of light mabye one mile in diameter going really fast.Itjust went out of sight going super fast.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sandy Ridge
There was one other sighting in Sandy Ridge on or around January 31st 2002
Summary: Bright ball and two saucers this year
